00016 class FCDAssetContributor;
00017 typedef FUObjectContainer<FCDAssetContributor> FCDAssetContributorContainer;
00018 
00019 class FCOLLADA_EXPORT FCDAsset : public FCDObject
00020 {
00021 private:
00022     DeclareObjectType(FCDObject);
00023 
00024     FCDAssetContributorContainer contributors;
00025     FUDateTime creationDateTime;
00026     FUDateTime modifiedDateTime;
00027     fstring keywords;
00028     fstring revision;
00029     fstring subject;
00030     fstring title;
00031     FMVector3 upAxis;
00032 
00033     // <unit>
00034     fstring unitName;
00035     float unitConversionFactor;
00036 
00037     // existence flags
00038     bool hasUnits, hasUpAxis;
00039 
00040 public:
00041     FCDAsset(FCDocument* document);
00042     virtual ~FCDAsset();
00043 
00044     // Direct contributor list access
00045     inline FCDAssetContributorContainer& GetContributors() { return contributors; }
00046     inline const FCDAssetContributorContainer& GetContributors() const { return contributors; }
00047     inline size_t GetContributorCount() const { return contributors.size(); }
00048     inline FCDAssetContributor* GetContributor(size_t index) { FUAssert(index < GetContributorCount(), return NULL); return contributors.at(index); }
00049     inline const FCDAssetContributor* GetContributor(size_t index) const { FUAssert(index < GetContributorCount(), return NULL); return contributors.at(index); }
00050     inline FCDAssetContributor* AddContributor() { return contributors.Add(GetDocument()); SetDirtyFlag(); }
00051 
00052     // Direct accessors
00053     inline const FUDateTime& GetCreationDateTime() const { return creationDateTime; }
00054     inline const FUDateTime& GetModifiedDateTime() const { return modifiedDateTime; }
00055     inline const fstring& GetKeywords() const { return keywords; }
00056     inline const fstring& GetRevision() const { return revision; }
00057     inline const fstring& GetSubject() const { return subject; }
00058     inline const fstring& GetTitle() const { return title; }
00059     inline const FMVector3& GetUpAxis() const { return upAxis; }
00060     inline const fstring& GetUnitName() const { return unitName; }
00061     inline float GetUnitConversionFactor() const { return unitConversionFactor; }
00062 
00063     // Direct mutators
00064     inline void SetKeywords(const fstring& _keywords) { keywords = _keywords; SetDirtyFlag(); }
00065     inline void SetRevision(const fstring& _revision) { revision = _revision; SetDirtyFlag(); }
00066     inline void SetSubject(const fstring& _subject) { subject = _subject; SetDirtyFlag(); }
00067     inline void SetTitle(const fstring& _title) { title = _title; SetDirtyFlag(); }
00068     inline void SetUpAxis(const FMVector3& _upAxis) { upAxis = _upAxis; hasUpAxis = true; SetDirtyFlag(); }
00069     inline void SetUnitName(const fstring& _unitName) { unitName = _unitName; SetDirtyFlag(); }
00070     inline void SetUnitConversionFactor(float factor) { unitConversionFactor = factor; hasUnits = true; SetDirtyFlag(); }
00071 
00072     // Access/Modify the existence flags
00073     inline bool HasUpAxis() { return hasUpAxis; }
00074     inline bool HasUnits() { return hasUnits; }
00075     inline void ResetUpAxis() { hasUpAxis = false; }
00076     inline void ResetUnits() { hasUnits = false; }
00077 
00078     // Clone another asset element.
00079     FCDAsset* Clone(FCDAsset* clone = NULL, bool cloneAllContributors = true) const;
00080 
00081     // Read in the <asset> element from a COLLADA XML document
00082     bool LoadFromXML(xmlNode* assetNode);
00083 
00084     // Write out the <asset> element to a COLLADA XML node tree
00085     // Calling this function will update the 'last modified' timestamp.
00086     xmlNode* WriteToXML(xmlNode* parentNode) const;
00087 };
00088 
00089 // Encapsulates the <asset><contributor> element
00090 class FCOLLADA_EXPORT FCDAssetContributor : public FCDObject
00091 {
00092 private:
00093     DeclareObjectType(FCDObject);
00094 
00095     fstring author;
00096     fstring authoringTool;
00097     fstring comments;
00098     fstring copyright;
00099     fstring sourceData;
00100 
00101 public:
00102     FCDAssetContributor(FCDocument* document);
00103     virtual ~FCDAssetContributor();
00104 
00105     // Direct accessors
00106     inline const fstring& GetAuthor() const { return author; }
00107     inline const fstring& GetAuthoringTool() const { return authoringTool; }
00108     inline const fstring& GetComments() const { return comments; }
00109     inline const fstring& GetCopyright() const { return copyright; }
00110     inline const fstring& GetSourceData() const { return sourceData; }
00111 
00112     // Direct mutators
00113     inline void SetAuthor(const fstring& _author) { author = _author; SetDirtyFlag(); }
00114     inline void SetAuthoringTool(const fstring& _authoringTool) { authoringTool = _authoringTool; SetDirtyFlag(); }
00115     inline void SetComments(const fstring& _comments) { comments = _comments; SetDirtyFlag(); }
00116     inline void SetCopyright(const fstring& _copyright) { copyright = _copyright; SetDirtyFlag(); }
00117     inline void SetSourceData(const fstring& _sourceData) { sourceData = _sourceData; SetDirtyFlag(); }
00118 
00119     // Returns whether this contributor element contain any valid data
00120     bool IsEmpty() const;
00121 
00122     // Clone another asset contributor.
00123     FCDAssetContributor* Clone(FCDAssetContributor* clone = NULL) const;
00124 
00125     // Read in the <asset><contributor> element from a COLLADA XML document
00126     bool LoadFromXML(xmlNode* contributorNode);
00127 
00128     // Write out the <asset><contributor> element to a COLLADA XML node tree
00129     xmlNode* WriteToXML(xmlNode* parentNode) const;
00130 };
